alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Colleton; Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 10:58AM EDT until June 19 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...COLLETON AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 1058 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Smoaks to Sheldon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Walterboro, Saint George, Yemassee, Colleton, Reevesville, Smoaks, Williams, Ruffin, Gardens Corner, Jacksonboro, Canadys, Ritter, Hendersonville, Round O, and Green Pond. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 42 and 79. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
